articles.author: Khushi Thakur
articles.title: An X-class flare released by the Sun caused a radio blackout in Australia and Japan - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Recently Sun released a strong solar flare that falls in the category of an X-class flare, which is the most powerful flare category of the Sun. This flare originated from the sunspot AR3738. This strong flare resulted in a blackout across the two countries A…
articles.content:
Recently Sun released a strong solar flare that falls in the category of an X-class flare, which is the most powerful flare category of the Sun. This flare originated from the sunspot AR3738.
